content.text:
# List of unsuccessful candidates for President of the Republic of China

Since the amendment of the Constitution of the Republic of China in 1994 that introduced direct elections, there have been 13 unsuccessful candidates for President of the Republic of China. Since 1996, four third party or independent candidacies have won at least ten percent of the popular vote, but all failed to win the presidency.
